channel.title: [help] Adding a Change slayertask option [help]

item.title: [help] Adding a Change slayertask option [help]
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:389994”][quote author=Sun Chips link=topic=485905.msg3560678#msg3560678 date=1302232958]
First fill an array of the task ids.
then you can use this.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“resettask”)) {
Random r = new Random();
int r2 = r.nextInt(50);
taskID = r2;
sM(“Slayer task reset!”);
}

now notice i passed in 50 but make sure you make it +1 however many indexes are in your array since Java starts at 0.
[/quote]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("resettask")) { taskID = Misc.random(50); sM("Slayer task reset!"); }[/quote]

i got an error how do i add all the taskID’s in the array?

Read full topic

item.title: [help] Adding a Change slayertask option [help]
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

i want to add a change slayertask option and someone told me to add

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resettask")) { taskID = 0; sM("Slayer Task reset!"); }

i know it says taskID its thats the variable or whatever but anyways…

i dont actually change it i just think it resets it because when i talk to the guy to try to get a new one i get the same thing any help?

i dont care if its a command or talking to the npc. just for now i rather have a command. thanks!

Read full topic
